Featured.name: Llama 3.1 8B
Featured.desc: Latest SOTA 8B model from Meta. Excellent general purpose instruction follower.

Featured.name: Qwen 2.5 7B
Featured.desc: Top-tier 7B model with exceptional reasoning, math, and coding capabilities.

Featured.name: Mistral Nemo 12B
Featured.desc: 12B parameter model by Mistral & NVIDIA. Large context, fits on 24GB VRAM.

Vision Language (VLM).name: Qwen2-VL 7B
Vision Language (VLM).desc: Advanced vision-language model. Reads images, charts, and video frames.

Vision Language (VLM).name: Pixtral 12B
Vision Language (VLM).desc: Multimodal version of Mistral Nemo. Strong image reasoning.

Vision Language (VLM).name: MiniCPM-V 2.6
Vision Language (VLM).desc: Efficient 8B vision model with GPT-4V level performance on some benchmarks.

Enterprise & Research.name: IBM Granite 3.0 8B
Enterprise & Research.desc: Enterprise-focused model from IBM. Apache 2.0, optimized for business data.

Enterprise & Research.name: GLM-4 9B
Enterprise & Research.desc: Powerful open-weights model from THUDM with strong multi-turn capabilities.

Enterprise & Research.name: Gemma 2 9B
Enterprise & Research.desc: Google's lightweight open model. High performance to size ratio.

Coding.name: Qwen 2.5 Coder 7B
Coding.desc: Specialized for coding tasks. State-of-the-art for its size.

Coding.name: DeepSeek Coder V2 Lite
Coding.desc: 16B MoE model (activates ~2.4B). Excellent at varied programming languages.
